channel.title: introspection on all things considered...
channel.description: Recent content in introspection on all things considered...

item.title: My first year in Management
item.description: About a year ago I transitioned into management. I changed my role from Senior Software Developer to Engineering Lead in Zalando. In this post I want to share my experience, good and bad, things that went well, where I screwed up and what I’m taking from it. A difficult first year Link to heading As my manager put it in my performance review: the last year was one of my most challenging ones.
